BodyName: Committee on Mental Health, Disabilities and Addiction
Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Hospitals, the Committee on Fire and Emergency Management and the Committee on Public Safety.

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Hospitals, the Committee on Fire and Emergency Management and the Committee on Public Safety.
Oversight – Mental Health Involuntary Removals and Mayor Adams’ Recently Announced Plan.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight – Mental Health Involuntary Removals and Mayor Adams’ Recently Announced Plan.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring police officers to receive training related to recognizing and interacting with individuals with autism spectrum disorder
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring police officers to receive training related to recognizing and interacting with individuals with autism spectrum disorder.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the office of community mental health to maintain access to an online services database
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the office of community mental health to maintain access to an online services database.
